txt.en:
After encountering the elusive ukhrash, Gurlázg, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

As you inspect Gurlázg's claw, you take care to not get yourself caught in its mighty grasp.

You decide to bring this trophy to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards, so that it might be preserved once Gundabad is reclaimed.
Deliver Gurlázg's claw to Belga Defthand at Steepset
Belga Defthand can be found at Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Gundabad. You should deliver it to Belga Defthand, a skilled taxidermist of the Longbeards.
After encountering the elusive ukhrash, Gurlázg, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Reclaimers of the Mountain-hold.

'What have you brought me now?'

Belga Defthand inspects Gurlázg's claw closely, holding it up to the light at Steepset.

'Ah, this shall make a fine trophy! I shall preserve this rare find. There are many strange creatures living within the depths of Gundabad. Perhaps you will find them all!'
